con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper; import java.util.List; import java.util.Map;
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) def json = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["request_role"].testRequest.response.contentAsString def data = new JsonSlurper().parseText( json )
def admin_role = data .find { it.name == "Admin" } assert admin_role.id == "1" assert admin_role.owner_email == "adam.eivy@disney.com" assert admin_role.status == "Active"
def apim_owner = data .find { it.name == "Apim_Environment_Owner" } assert apim_owner.id == "13" assert apim_owner.owner_email == "andrew.kolve@disney.com" assert apim_owner.status == "Active"
def apim_user = data .find { it.name == "Api_User" } assert apim_user.id == "7" assert apim_user.owner_email == "andrew.kolve@disney.com" assert apim_user.status == "Active"
def backlog_role = data .find { it.name == "Backlog" } assert backlog_role.id == "65" assert backlog_role.owner_email == "adam.x.eivy.-nd@disney.com" assert backlog_role.status == "Active"
def backlog_admin = data .find { it.name == "Backlog_Admin" } assert backlog_admin.id == "66" assert backlog_admin.owner_email == "adam.x.eivy.-nd@disney.com" assert backlog_admin.status == "Active"
def billing_role = data .find { it.name == "Billing" } assert billing_role.id == "8" assert billing_role.owner_email == "adam.x.eivy.-nd@disney.com" assert billing_role.status == "Active"
def m4_admin = data .find { it.name == "M4" } assert m4_admin.id == "64" assert m4_admin.owner_email == "noah.kassos@disney.com" assert m4_admin.status == "Active"
def mfis_role = data .find { it.name == "MFIS" } assert mfis_role.id == "21" assert mfis_role.owner_email == "arun.jacob@disney.com" assert mfis_role.status == "Active"
def mfis_admin = data .find { it.name == "MFIS_Admin" } assert mfis_admin.id == "51" assert mfis_admin.owner_email == "arun.jacob@disney.com" assert mfis_admin.status == "Active"
def mfis_consumer = data .find { it.name == "MFIS_Consumer" } assert mfis_consumer.id == "41" assert mfis_consumer.owner_email == "arun.jacob@disney.com" assert mfis_consumer.status == "Active"
def mfis_owner = data .find { it.name == "MFIS_Owner" } assert mfis_owner.id == "31" assert mfis_owner.owner_email == "arun.jacob@disney.com" assert mfis_owner.status == "Active"
def oauth_admin = data .find { it.name == "OAuth_Admin" } assert oauth_admin.id == "62" assert oauth_admin.owner_email == "oliver.x.wallace.-nd@email.disney.com" assert oauth_admin.status == "Active"
def portal_dev = data .find { it.name == "Portal" } assert portal_dev.id == "9" assert portal_dev.owner_email == "adam.eivy@disney.com" assert portal_dev.status == "Active"
def soc = data .find { it.name == "SOC" } assert soc.id == "10" assert soc.owner_email == "adam.eivy@disney.com" assert soc.status == "Active"
def user_admin = data .find { it.name == "User_Admin" } assert user_admin.id == "11" assert user_admin.owner_email == "adam.eivy@disney.com" assert user_admin.status == "Active"
def ux = data .find { it.name == "UX_Reviewer" } assert ux.id == "67" assert ux.owner_email == "nigel.simpson@disney.com"
